text: Nord-Trøndelag was a county in Norway. The capital was Steinkjer. It is near the Swedish border on the Norwegian Sea (Atlantic Ocean). In 1804, it was split into two counties. In 2018, the county merged with Sør-Trøndelag to the current county of Trøndelag. Category:Former counties of Norway Category:Trøndelag
title: Nord-Trøndelag
